name: escapeultimateroom
0:
”Alexa, open escape ultimate room”
”help”
”look at left”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: escape ultimate room
des:
Cassandra is trapped in a room and she needs your help to find the way out, test your skills to find the exit.
You can observe the room with the "Look" command, the possible directions are right, left, up, down, forward and back.
Use the "Get" command to add an item to the inventory.
Use the word "Inspect" to closely observe an object.
Use the word "Use" to combine multiple objects.

for contact write to info_game@blu.it
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
